评论详情: Color is a bright cherry red versus the dark maroon that is pictured that I really wanted. Sweater is still soft and comfy but disappointed in the color.
My wife said it's the comfiest material she's worn in a while and wishes they had more designs.
Fabric is itchy and it runs really small. I'd size up at least 2 sizes.
I thought it’d be a little thicker but it’s nice. It’s sort of thin. And I wanted it more baggy I am usually a small and got a Large. I should of got an Xtra large
It’s a soft and thick material. It’s true to the photo. I wish it came in more patterns, it’s my new favorite!

This sweater was exactly what I expected. It fits great, looks stylish, keeps you warm. It feels a little scratchy but not too bad, it’s what I expected with this type of sweater. I’ve machine washed it a few times (then laid flat to dry) and it’s holding up pretty well. I’m excited to wear it throughout the fall and winter.
Have to be careful not to ripe it
Super soft and cute! Love the brown as it's more subtle.

评论概述: On Shein for half the price
评论详情: sweater is very warm, not itchy, and has a cool pattern. BUT the fit/cut isn't amazing ( not the worst though either). Also I looked this up after I bought it and found it for only $20 on Shein ( unless it is a less quality copy?)

I was expecting a maroon/ dark red color to go with an outfit I had planned. It arrived and it a very bright almost Christmas red/ pink. Still a nice material and design, but definitely the wrong color
the sweaters soft and came as described with the color and print, would recommend

评论概述: Pattern is fantastic, sleeves a little strange, overall alright
评论详情: I wish this was just normally shaped but otherwise it is soft enough and comfortable enough. The sleeves are slightly stretched out looking and it kind of makes for an awkward feel. I love the pattern on it and that's why I purchased it.
It fuzzes up quickly and snags onto sharp surfaces easily. It's super warm though and looks really amazing. Recommend!!
Love the sweater, I wear it nearly every day
